Player History
Moved to the US and entered the free agent pool in 2016.
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/11/2016 to a 6-year deal worth $13,500,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2016, off Dave Gurrola (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2016, off Christopher Engstrom (CIN)...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 7/17/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2016, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Injured on 5/24/2017 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 10/1/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2018, hitting .483 with 5 HR, 14 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2019, hitting .484 with 3 HR, 15 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2020, hitting .471 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2020, hitting .313 with 8 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2020, hitting .407 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 5/22/2021 with a Broken Wrist, out for 7 weeks...
